verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ul colineli. Mamin Jehová, cotanh elanhchamel yic tzin a colani.
Ha eb' snib'an in smilanchamoc, q'uixvocab' el eb', somchajocab' el eb'. Ha eb' sgana yak'an chukal t'ayin, b'atocab' eb' elelal yuj q'uixvelal.
Ha eb' tzin b'uchani, aton eb' tz'el stzub' t'ayin, b'atocab' eb' elelal yuj q'uixvelal.
Axo masanil eb' syaq'uem sb'a t'ayach, tzalajocab' sk'ol eb'. Ha eb' snib'an a colval, yalocab' eb' to te niwan elk'ochi.
Ha in pax tik jun, ilb'aj in k'ool, cusk'olal vaji. Axo svalani: Ach in Diosal, cotanh t'a elanhchamel yic tzin a colani. Ha achnhej tzin a coltaxoni. Cotanh t'a elanhchamel, Mamin Jehová, xin chi.
